about: I've been working as an illustrator/graphics designer for the past 4 years. I have full command of Adobe Photoshop & Adobe Illustrator. I make lovely and as per your need illustrations, photo editing and other Photoshop work that help you and your entrepreneurial clients to attract the perfect audience. It will help to increase your business' conversion rate and to find an original voice to your words. I hope to get along with you.

emplyment.name: WeCustomBoxes
emplyment.shortDesc: I started working as a Packaging Designer in WeCustomBoxes in April, 2021. I had a very great experience in this field.

emplyment.name: Fiverr
emplyment.shortDesc: I am a level 1 seller on the Fiverr with more than 2+ years and i have 5 Star rating on fiverr.

emplyment.shortDesc: I have completed my Internship from CoreSolution&Services. I was working there as a Website Designer.It was really nice experience working with them.

education&certification.shortDesc: I've completed my schooling from jannah Public School located in Gujrat.
I have completed my Graphic Design Course from Brains Group of Collages. The duration of the course was 3 months with monthly Assignments for practice.
I have completed my Internship from CoreSolution&Services. I was working there as a Website Designer.It was really nice experience working with them.
I started working as a graphic designer at ArtBox by Naba in 2017. I was working there as a social media manager/designer.

testimonals.name: Jhonsmither
testimonals.review: Asad khan was great! 5 Starts are less for his awesome fast delivery really wasn't sure what i wanted for my logo and he came up with a logo for me. I really love the logo and my twitch overlay design. i will definitely work with Him again and recommend him to others.

testimonals.name: Digihunk
testimonals.review: What a great experience it was...I must tell you this guy is so hardworking & committed...I have bought his gigs before also but this time I was in a hurry & for my bad, this guy was in hospital but guess what he still went for the extra miles to complete my project on time & exactly the way I wanted...He is very sharp & has some good graphic skills under his belt...Thanks man, I really appreciate your support...More projects coming your way..Cheers!

testimonals.review: Great overall experience, will use this designer again! Highly recommend, he will make sure you are happy.

testimonals.review: Awesome Work! I really love the photo he edited for me. Just as I wanted. He is a Professional. Highly recommend him. very fast delivery.

testimonals.review: Unbleavable!! I just asked him and he did it in no time. I really like his work and he is very kind with comunication. Highly recomend him for any photoshop word you need.

testimonals.review: My first time working with the guy and it was really great! Available 24/7 and always with the best professional attitude and pleasure to work with. highly recommend! :)
